attributes.action: Ban the sale of cruel caged eggs
attributes.additional_details: Animals give so much to us, they like us deserve comfort. It is time to ban this cruel, outdated practice of caging up animals for the sake of maximum profit.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of all caged eggs in the United Kingdom

rejection.details:
Battery cages were banned in 2012 but the use of enriched cages is still permitted. 

There is already a petition calling for a ban on these 'enriched' cages which you may wish to sign:

Make it illegal to use "enriched" cages in farming 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716075
